attributes.additional_details:
Minister have said that the country can not afford Public Sector Pensions. Polaticians are Public Sector, they are elected by the People and Paid for by the People who also Pay Tax to give them a Fat Pension and High Salery. Polaticians should also have theire Pensions Cut and be made to work Longer before they are eligable. MPs can get too much money for what they do, the House of Commons is generaly near empty when debates take place.
It is about time they truly considered ordinary people of the United Kingdom instead of looking after themselves an Fat Cat Company Bosses and Bankers.
